Text Message Consent Agreement

By providing your phone number and opting in, you agree to receive text messages (SMS) from Spines related to the following purposes:

  1. Order Updates: Notifications regarding the status of your orders, including confirmations, shipping updates, and delivery confirmations.
  2. Customer Support: Assistance with your orders, responses to inquiries, and resolution of any issues related to our products or services.
  3. Event Notifications: Information about upcoming events, webinars, and other relevant activities hosted by Spines.
  4. Account Alerts: Important alerts regarding your account, such as password changes, security notifications, and other account-related information.
  5. Marketing Materials: Promotional messages, special offers, and marketing materials related to Spines products and services.
 

How to Withdraw Your Consent: You have the right to withdraw your consent to receive text messages from Spines at any time. To opt-out of receiving text messages, you can use any of the following methods:

  1. Reply ‘STOP’: Reply to any text message you receive from us with the word “STOP.” This will automatically unsubscribe you from further text communications.
  2. Contact Customer Support: Reach out to our customer support team at hello@spines.com or +1 727 273-7427 and request to be unsubscribed from text messages.
  3. Update Preferences: Log in to your account on our website and update your communication preferences to opt-out of receiving text messages.

Please note that even if you opt-out of receiving promotional text messages, you may still receive transactional messages related to your orders or account.

By opting in, you confirm that you are the owner or authorized user of the phone number provided and that you understand and agree to the terms outlined above.

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this consent disclaimer, please contact us at hello@spines.com or +1-727-273-7427.
